name: Virtual Reality Online Shooter (VR)
description:
• Virtual reality shooter you can play with AI player or with a friend via same wi-fi network.
• Comfortable control.
• Pretty good graphics, which not cause eyes bleeding.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
!!! Warning !!!
- Do not try to play this game without 3D glasses. It is only for virtual reality(vr) devices like Google Cardboard or similar.
- For LAN game you should turn off your firewall on the computer(if both devices connected to same wi-fi router). If wi-fi network consumed from host iPhone's no action required.
